mapper.sql: SELECT A.BCODE,A.TITLE,A.CONTENT,A.DISTINGUISH,A.WRITERID,TO_CHAR(A.POSTDATE,'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') POSTDATE,A.HASFILE, B.DISCODE,B.NAME, C.BCODE CB,C.VIEWNUM,C.BEST,C.GOOD,C.BAD,C.WORST,C.CAL,C.MEDAL,C.REPORT, (SELECT TO_CHAR(COUNT(*)) FROM COMMENTS D WHERE A.BCODE=D.BCODE) ISDELETE, E.PHOTO,E.LEVELITEM FROM BOARD A JOIN BOARDCODE B ON A.DISTINGUISH=B.DISCODE JOIN BOARDPOINT C ON A.BCODE=C.BCODE JOIN MEMBER E ON A.WRITERID = E.ID

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ${alias}) RNUM, A.BCODE,A.TITLE,A.CONTENT,A.DISTINGUISH,A.WRITERID,TO_CHAR(A.POSTDATE,'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') POSTDATE,A.HASFILE, B.DISCODE,B.NAME, C.BCODE CB,C.VIEWNUM,C.BEST,C.GOOD,C.BAD,C.WORST,C.CAL,C.MEDAL,C.REPORT, (SELECT TO_CHAR(COUNT(*)) FROM COMMENTS D WHERE A.BCODE=D.BCODE) ISDELETE, E.PHOTO, E.LEVELITEM FROM BOARD A JOIN BOARDCODE B ON A.DISTINGUISH=B.DISCODE JOIN BOARDPOINT C ON A.BCODE=C.BCODE JOIN MEMBER E ON A.WRITERID = E.ID WHERE ISDELETE IS NULL
mapper.select: WHERE A.BCODE IN (SELECT DISTINCT BCODE FROM COMMENTS WHERE WRITERID=#{writerId})
WHERE A.WRITERID = #{writerId} AND ISDELETE IS NULL

WHERE A.DISTINGUISH=3 AND SYSDATE BETWEEN #{first} AND #{second}+7
AND ISDELETE IS NULL
WHERE (UPPER(A.TITLE) LIKE '%'||#{keyword1}||'%' OR UPPER(A.CONTENT) LIKE '%'||#{keyword2}||'%') AND ISDELETE IS NULL
WHERE (UPPER(A.TITLE) LIKE '%'||#{keyword1}||'%' OR UPPER(A.CONTENT) LIKE '%'||#{keyword2}||'%') AND A.DISTINGUISH = #{dis} AND ISDELETE IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARDPOINT SET VIEWNUM=VIEWNUM+1 WHERE BCODE=#{bcode}
mapper.select: SELECT NAME FROM BOARDCODE WHERE DISCODE=#{dis}
